## HTML

```html
<div>
  <header>
    <h2>SHARKIT</h2>
  </header>

  <main>
    <h3>Dear <strong>Juan Perez</strong>,</h3>
    <p>
      We inform you that, at your request, we have generated a security code to
      update your default password in our system <strong>XXXXXX</strong>. This
      code is necessary to complete the password change process and ensure the
      protection of your account.
    </p>
    <p>
      <strong>Security Code:</strong>
      <span>4DM1N</span>
    </p>
    <p><strong>Expiration date:</strong> 10/09/24, 10:03 PM</p>
    <p>
      To update your password, please visit our page to complete the process:
    </p>
    <a href="#">Go to website</a>
    <p>
      If you <strong>did not request</strong> this change, please contact our
      support team immediately to ensure the protection of your account.
    </p>
    <p>
      We appreciate your attention and remain at your disposal for any further
      inquiries or assistance you may need.
    </p>
    <p>Best regards, Sincerely.</p>
    <figure>
      <img
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        alt="Sharkit Logo"
      />
      <figcaption>Internal Control Offices</figcaption>
    </figure>

    <footer>
      <hr />
      <p>Your values are only seen through your actions</p>
    </footer>
  </main>
</div>
```
